c74object.name: tap.buffer.record~
c74object.description: tap.buffer.record~ is an alternative to MSP's standard record~ object. Where record operations with MSP's record~ simply replace the buffer contents at the index, tap.buffer.record~ actually fades in the new values over a short (default = 10 samples) period. The benefit of this approach is that it reduces pops created in applications where the play head may cross the record head.

objarg.name: buffername
objarg.description: The name of a buffer to reference.

method.name: int
method.description: Toggle on and off whether or not the object is currently recording.

attribute.name: fade
attribute.description: Specifies the number of milliseconds over which newly recorded samples are faded into the buffer.

attribute.name: channel
attribute.description: Specifies the channel number in the buffer to which new samples should be written.
